section.name: Ignatius the Devout
section.p: Ignatius is a traveller whose desire is to learn all he can about the deities of the Fabled Lands. His strong beliefs give his sermons added zest, and he has enthralled many a crowd with his impassioned speeches. He is looking for the house of priests in Marlock City.
You can play as Ignatius, or as a priest with a different name (enter it in the 'Name' field). To begin your adventure, .
